creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: image created with tiny squares of color in an overall grid, with white lines between squares; landscape with water at center with flat bridge, mountains and trees; trompe l'oeil painted mount with dark grey at bottom, light grey round image and bars of clouds in gold above and below image and similar vertical bars at top; two painted "seals" along right edge, LRQ; ivory roller ends
title: Landscape in Mosaic Form
